text: nimage tiḷidirali, nim'ma yud'dha sampattinalli aidanē ondu bhāgavu allāhanige, (avana) dūtarige, (nim'ma) bandhugaḷige, anātharige, baḍavarige mattu prayāṇikarige sēride. Nīvu allāhanalli nambike uḷḷavarāgiddare mattu (satya-mithyagaḷa) pratyēkateya dina hāgū eraḍu paḍegaḷu edurugoṇḍa (badr‌yud'dhada) dina nāvu nam'ma dāsanige nīḍiddaralli (divya sahāyadalli) nambike uḷḷavarāgiddare (ī niyamavannu pālisiri). Allāhanu ellavannū māḍaballanu
